onCellClick Event

Parameters:

  • x_index - index of scale's cell
  • x_index - index of scale's cell
  • x_value - index of scale's cell
  • y_value - label(text content) of cell in question
  • e - native event object
  scheduler.attachEvent("onCellClick", function (x_index, y_index, x_value, y_value, e){
       //any custom logic here
  });

Event occurs when user is clicking on data cell, inside a timeline view
